CustomField.description: CC BWRD Customer Acquisition Cost Weighted Score Auto
CustomField.formula: CASE( Customer_Acquisition_Cost__c, '(1) High Cost', 1 * Customer_Acquisition_Cost_Weight__c, '(2) Somewhat High Cost', 2 * Customer_Acquisition_Cost_Weight__c, '(3) Medium Cost', 3 * Customer_Acquisition_Cost_Weight__c, '(4) Somewhat Low Cost', 4 * Customer_Acquisition_Cost_Weight__c, '(5) Low Cost', 5 * Customer_Acquisition_Cost_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Customer Acquisition Cost Weighted Score
